formulas.name: f_ErrorMessage
formulas.expression: SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(LEFT({!var_Error}, FIND( "You can look", {!var_Error} ) - 1 ), "This error occurred when the flow tried to create records:",""), "This error occurred when the flow tried to update records:",""), "The flow tried to update these records: null. This error occurred: ","")
